titles.title: For the relief of the Sara, Jade, and Jordan Hutchings.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 10/12/1995--Introduced. Declares that the application for children's insurance benefits under the Social Security Act filed by a named individual on behalf of three named individuals shall be deemed to have been filed before September 30, 1986.
